overview: This is the best After School Slut Club yet. Why, you ask? Lovely redhead Linda sucks and fucks her old professor right in front of her shocked classmates! Ella's blowing bubble gum... and her dirty, old teacher. Plus, Trinity gets busted skipping school. Uh-oh! Her only hope to get off scot-free is getting the security guard off! It's the most ball-draining, cherry-poppin' club ever!
title: After School Slut Club 4
